OpenAPI demo endpoint.

Requires headers:
- X-App-Id: Application ID
- X-Timestamp: Current timestamp
- X-Sign: Signature
- X-Trace-Id: Trace ID

Signature generation:
HMAC-SHA256(app_key, "app_id={app_id}&timestamp={timestamp}&trace_id={trace_id}")
